name: Armory
description: Weapon and armor related quests from the Armorer

quests.description: Bring me any spare Ammobox, and I can break it down into Gunpowder for cheap!

rawData.Title: Breakdown Ammoboxes for Gunpower

quests.name: Blast Caps for Grenades
quests.description: I am not selling enough Grenades, bring me 10 Blast Caps and I will give you a discount on Grenades.

rawData.Title: Blast Caps for Grenades
rawData.Description: I am not selling enough Grenades, bring me 10 Blast Caps and I will give you a discount on Grenades.

quests.name: Fast Cash
quests.description: Need money? Grab a Rag and a bar of Soap, start cleaning the place.

rawData.Title: Fast Cash
rawData.Description: Need money? Grab a Rag and a bar of Soap, start cleaning the place.

quests.name: Help Make Combat Helmets
quests.description: Gather some materials for me so I can make some Combat Helments and I will GIVE you one!

rawData.Title: Help Make Combat Helmets
rawData.Description: Gather some materials for me so I can make some Combat Helments and I will GIVE you one!

quests.name: Huge Shipment Of Armor
quests.description: My crew just delivered a huge shipment of Armor. Bring me some extra Ammo and Metal Pipes, and I'll sell you one for cheap.

rawData.Title: Huge Shipment Of Armor
rawData.Description: My crew just delivered a huge shipment of Armor. Bring me some extra Ammo and Metal Pipes, and I'll sell you one for cheap.

quests.name: Hunting Shack
quests.description: I'm building a hunting shack in the woods and I need some items to help make it... scummy. Get them and I'll pay you for helping.

rawData.Description: I'm building a hunting shack in the woods and I need some items to help make it... scummy. Get them and I'll pay you for helping.

quests.name: New Shipment of Military Quivers
quests.description: I'll trade you a brand new Military Quiver and $2000 for some Crafted 12 Gauge Ammo, bring me 10 rounds.

rawData.Title: New Shipment of Military Quivers
rawData.Description: I'll trade you a brand new Military Quiver and $2000 for some Crafted 12 Gauge Ammo, bring me 10 rounds.

quests.description: These military boots weren't just made for walking. Get me a pair and I'll give you some cash for them.

rawData.Description: These military boots weren't just made for walking. Get me a pair and I'll give you some cash for them.

Conditions.TrackingCaption: Bring me a pair of Military Boots

quests.name: Rebuilding The Shop
quests.description: I'm rebuilding the shop and I need some construction materials. Help me and I'll give you some cash.

rawData.Title: Rebuilding The Shop
rawData.Description: I'm rebuilding the shop and I need some construction materials. Help me and I'll give you some cash.

quests.name: Scope Repairs
quests.description: We need some repair parts for these Scopes. Bring me some glass materials that would be good enough to make Scopes with, and I'll give you some cash.

rawData.Description: We need some repair parts for these Scopes. Bring me some glass materials that would be good enough to make Scopes with, and I'll give you some cash.

Conditions.TrackingCaption: Bring me 4 Lenses or Magnifying Glasses

quests.name: Security Alert
quests.description: We have had a lot of people around the shop. Find me some gear that I can use to make a security system with. I'll give you some cash if you do!

rawData.Title: Security Alert
rawData.Description: We have had a lot of people around the shop. Find me some gear that I can use to make a security system with. I'll give you some cash if you do!

quests.name: Tang Sword Shipment
quests.description: A new shipment of swords has arrived but my display case is broken, bring the items I need to fix the shop up and I'll give you a discount on a new Sword.
rewards: 1x 2H Tang Dao Black Dragon (5000 Credits each)

rawData.Title: Tang Sword Shipment
rawData.Description: A new shipment of swords has arrived but my display case is broken, bring the items I need to fix the shop up and I'll give you a discount on a new Sword.

name: Medical
description: Health and medical supply quests from the Doctor

quests.name: A Krok of Shit
quests.description: My crew needs Kroks only found at the Klenovnik Hospital in B0, bring me 10 pairs.

rawData.Description: My crew needs Kroks only found at the Klenovnik Hospital in B0, bring me 10 pairs.

quests.name: Medical Practice
quests.description: I need you to sabotage a corpse at the Hospital in Klenovnik, B0. No questions asked. I'l even teach you a few medical tricks.
requirements: Locate the body at the Hospital in Klenovnik, B0

rawData.Description: I need you to sabotage a corpse at the Hospital in Klenovnik, B0. No questions asked. I'l even teach you a few medical tricks.

quests.name: Missing Scalpels
quests.description: Someone has stolen my Scalpels, I need them to perform plastic surgery, and tons of ladies want their chest bigger. I cannot make them larger without a scalpel. I'll give you some cash too!

quests.name: Where Are My Pens?
quests.description: I seem to be missing all of my pens. I need them to write prescriptions and to take notes on patients. Bring me some pens, now hurry before I forget! I'll give you some cash.

quests.name: Find my package at Airfireld in Z0
quests.description: I was waiting on a package to arrive with special parts for my boat lift at the Airfield in Z0. I haven't heard if they have arrived yet, but I don't have time to check. Check it for me and I'll give you a deal on a Fishing Pole and Reel.
requirements: Go to the Airfield in Z0, check if the package has arrived.

quests.name: Supplies for Laika Trunk Doors & Back Bumper
quests.description: These scum bag drivers are dropping damaged goods because they can't close their storage containers! These supplies will help me build more Laika Trunk Doors and Back Bumpers. Get me 30 pieces of Scrap Metal, 10 Bolts, and 20 pieces of Rubber. You might find some supplies in the Car Garage at the Prison, C2

rewards: 1x Laika Bumper Back Item (400 Credits each)

quests.name: Lost Love
quests.description: I had a date last night, but she never showed up. The last time we talked, she was about to leave her home in Apatija, in A1. Go see if she left, or met her fate.
requirements: Find the car belonging to the mechanics date in Apatrija, A1
